repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: An artificial colelction of the university's stratigic plans which domument the major policy directions set forth by the university administration.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The University at Albany was created in 1844, and has continued to change and reform as the years have gone by. This strategic plan is just another step in the changing world of Universities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection is made up of the Strategic Plan for the University at Albany entitled "The World Within Reach." The document includes all the future plans for the ensuing decade on how to expand and keep the University up to date in the academici world.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Strategic Plans Collection, 2017. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Strategic Plans Collection).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: All items in this manuscript group were donated to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection was maintained in the order that it was found.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: University-created records are public records under New York State law.

did.unittitle: "The World Within Reach" University at Albany Strategic Plan
